oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reactions of bisbenzalacetone with functionalised enamines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, TV
RAVISHANKAR, L
BASKARAN, S
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reaction of the cross-conjugated olefin, bisbenzalacetone 2 with different functionalised enamines, results in the formation of different types of products. Crotonaldehyde dienamine 9 gives the cyclohexene derivative 10; isomeric mixture of isophorone dienamine 11 gives the delta-annulated product 12 and the dimedone enaminone 13 affords the spiroannulated compound 14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 35(6), 546-551
